Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Same old statuses[;] but now your equipment and gadgets|are completely different!
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){ var rewards1 = [~Equipment:Bustle~[;] ~Equipment:Two Handed Spike~[;] ~Equipment:Desperation Attack~[;] ~Equipment:Uberbump~]; rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2); }

Description: Everything from the Lite round[;]|plus some all-new remix rules.
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){ var rewards1 = [~Equipment:Bustle~[;] ~Equipment:Two Handed Spike~[;] ~Equipment:Desperation Attack~[;] ~Equipment:Uberbump~]; rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2); }
